name: Asgard
passiveSkills: Reduce all damage by 60% and take no more than 20% of your MAX HP in damage from a single hit
Grant Perfect Revenge to all allies at the start of battle for the duration of battle
35% Chance to heal all allies for 10% of their MAX HP after each action
35% Chance to grant your allies Immortality, Perfect Cleanse, and Golden Hit for 1 turn after each action.
